column3: The bump for 2017 has a commit or author date of 2018, so this will incorrectly bump all files to 2018.
Please read the https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#refactoring part.\nSuch refactoring is better be done by more experience contributors...

There are two oppertunities to change copyright dates:
- When you change a file in a PR
- At the end of the year, sweeping for files that have been modified in that year (as in #12062)

Changing to 2018 now is too early, and will result in tons of similar PRs.
